entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a scar that hurts when Voldemort is near.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is surprised and impressed by Harry's ability to read Voldemort's mind.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as being able to be read by Harry through his mood.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: A Hogwarts teacher who makes prophecies.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as having told Harry that he can sense Voldemort's mood when he is near.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school where Harry and Ron are students.

entities.name: grimmald place
entities.description: Harry's home, mentioned as the location of his bedroom.

relationships.description: Harry can sense Voldemort's mood when he is near.
Dumbledore told Harry that he can sense Voldemort's mood when he is near.
